question: Which of the following Chalukyan king built the temple of Siva at Pattadakal in Bijapur district?
explanation: The Chalukyan king Vijayadita built the temple of Siva at Pattadakal in the Bijapur district. His sister also built a Jain temple at Lakshmeswar. Vijaydita was tolerant towards Jainism. He also donated villages to Jain preachers.
